title: A few suggestions while it's in Beta...
content:
I don’t know if this is the appropriate place for this but I have a few comments/suggestions.  
(the new site looks great, by the way! and is so much faster!)

1. Does the initial post/topic have to be so HUGE???

2. Links seem to open automatically in the same window - is there a way to set the preference so that they automatically open a new browser window? Also in the html formatting guide I don’t see a way to do this.

3. Can the FAQ anchor to the top like the Fontshop note?

If this isn’t the right place to post this I’m sorry but I don’t know who to direct this to…
author: pattyfab

comments.content:
